commit message:
Fix App List jumping to top on update.

-Not perfect: only preserves adapter location, not pixel location.

Add preference to choose TTS audio stream.

Add option to change audio stream between notification & media.
-Volume control in activity changes depending on setting.
Move App List preference above TTS preferences.
Move setting of prefs to Common.

Fix repeating notifications being spoken.

-Identical notifications not spoken unless stopped for over 10 sec.
-Repeating notifications are usually progress bars.
-Not perfect: Would still speak after different message.
Add Paypal donate option & increase version.

Fix issue with duplicate ignores being created.

Change IGNORE_OFF to IGNORE_NONE and IGNORE_ON to IGNORE_ALL.
